2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
